home.welcome: Junyoung, a developer who designs trust

meta.title: Junyoung Portfolio
meta.description: Portfolio of Junyoung, a developer who designs trust.

home.description:
Currently seeking new opportunities.
Previously, I designed and developed Lottie-based products at a record platform named 'Jejodo', and as a frontend developer at 'Berabt', I designed and developed two B2C service products.
Leveraging my background in business administration, I focus on problem-solving through collaboration and communication.
Recently, I am interested in enhancing the technical depth of both the team and myself through AI collaboration.
